text: Cori Henry (born December 9, 1976) is a British sprinter who specializes in the 400 meters. He won a silver medal in the 4 × 400 m relay at the 2003 World Indoor Championships in Barcelona, along with Jamie Baulch, Timothy Benjamin, and Daniel Caines, finishing with a time of 3:06.12. At the 2002 Commonwealth Games, he competed for England in the semifinal but not the final of the 4 × 400 m relay; his team won the gold medal. == References == Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:British male sprinters Category:World Athletics Indoor Championships medalists Category:Commonwealth Games gold medallists for England Category:Commonwealth Games gold medallists in athletics
title: Cori Henry
